item.description: Join us for a fun filled story hour. Get in the Rosh Hashana spirit by hearing stories, and singing songs about Rosh Hashana. Meet Sammy the spider and create a Rosh Hashana craft.Enjoy some yummy snacks and drinks as well. Free and open to the public. For more info or to RSVP: call 978 977 9111 or email raizel@jewishpeabody.com

group.name: mommy and me with a Jewish twist

item.name: Barnes & Nobles Story Hour
